help.title: Help
help.content:
Getting Started

Habit Bell is a Pomodoro-style timer designed to help you build habits through focused work sessions and regular breaks.

How to Use

1. Set your desired session and interval durations in Settings.

2. Press the play button to start the timer.

3. Work until the interval timer completes.

4. Take a short break when the interval ends.

5. Continue until your session is complete.

Statistics

Habit Bell tracks your sessions, intervals, and pauses to help you monitor your progress over time.

Keyboard Shortcuts

Space: Start/Pause timer

R: Reset timer

F: Toggle fullscreen

about.title: About
about.content:
Habit Bell

Version 1.0.0

Habit Bell is a productivity tool designed to help you build consistent habits through timed work sessions.

Features

  • Customizable session and interval durations
  • Activity tracking and statistics
  • Dark and light themes
  • Multiple language support

Technologies

Built with Next.js, React, and IndexedDB for a fast, responsive experience that works offline.

Privacy

All your data is stored locally on your device. We don't collect or transmit any personal information.
